ygData.subject: Tiny daggers
ygData.msgSnippet: Okies thanks fer help on freeport sk guild question just got one more question for you. I have realized how great archery can be expecially with our pets but
ygData.messageBody:
Okies thanks fer help on freeport sk guild question just got one more
question for you. I have realized how great archery can be expecially with
our pets but when I went to use a tiny dagger as it uses archery skill though
in the melee spot I couldnt equip it. So am I doing something wrong or did
Verant change it so you cant use it anymore? Id really like to use it if
possibe as getting it up with arrows will be time consuming and expensive.

Gaukan
